results.title: Franchised Assistant Meeting and Events Diary Manager
results.description: Thank you for your interest in this position. It is a job opportunity with one of Marriott International’s franchisees. Please apply via email at: jemma.brooksrenaissanceheathrow.co.uk Additional Information: This hotel is owned and operated by an independent franchisee, Grove HR Limited. The franchisee controls all aspects of the hotel’s employment policies and practices, including the selection and hiring process. If you accept a position at this hotel you will be employed by a franchisee and…

results.title: Senior Insight Analyst Unique Client
results.description: Our clients are possibly the most exciting new Retail Banking clients in the UK at this moment. This role is working for their Unsecured team. This role reports into the Senior Analytics Manager, and is responsible for valuation and performance reporting to inform regular reviews on customers. In addition the role will support the Senior Analytics Manager in performing commercial analysis across the dozen different portfolios managed, to drive commercial strategy. Required candidate will requir…

We have a few positions available for those with good customer service skills who also enjoy a sales environment.The role does not require any cold calling, the products market themselves through online media and local literature to residential markets. Our client prides on their strong training programme.Progression opportunities available, with large potential commission incomes to those whom excel with management opportunities existing.
results.title: Customer Sales Operative
Retail Assistant / Manager
results.description: We are recruiting for Retail Assistants and Managers for a well established British, everyday home essentials, company.Positions include online media marketing, residential brochure delivery, merchandise delivery with team management and business leadership opportunities available.Income varies widely, depending on responsibilities and number of hours worked and will discussed in interviews. Training is fully provided.

Working flexible hours to suit, we are currently recruiting for Customer Retail Associates to promote merchandise through either online media, retail literature or both.A well known British consumer company whom provides themselves on a strong training program. Team Leaders also required with incomes over in excess of £25k for the ambitious.
results.title: Customer Retail Associate

results.description: Internet marketing through social media and other online selling platforms. Processing orders either locally or nationally via a well established household British company brand.AND/OR :-Distribution and collection of retail books in your local area, stock ordering and delivery of customer-ordered merchandise. NO cold calling, you do not need any previous experience - full training provided. From approx GBP6.50 per hour rising to GBP20 plus per hour after six months.Team Leader, and then Busine…
